crypto.name: Hidden In Plain Sight
crypto.desc:
Should just be a simple matrix, isn't it?

~dosisido

crypto.name: Magic OTP
crypto.desc:
I just studied some hardware cryptography - what do you think about my new secure OTP?

~dosisido

crypto.name: NO birthday s.r.l
crypto.desc:
NO birthday s.r.l wishes you all a good onboarding

~dosisido

crypto.name: OG Game 2
crypto.desc:
This time i implemented an ubreakable anti cheat system, good luck trying to bypass it!

~Beat

crypto.name: Sloppy Admin
crypto.desc:
Here's my new super safe RSA auth. Can you break it?

~mrdega

misc.name: Coding playground
misc.desc:
We all start somewhere. Share the moment your first project went completely off the rails. It's a rite of passage! Welcome to coding!

~Depp1135, Ciovino

misc.name: The Lost Disk
misc.desc:
The self-proclaimed best programmer in the world proudly announced:
“I’ve built the ultimate vault. A masterpiece. Totally unbreakable. The world’s greatest password generator. The finest archive mankind has ever seen.”

Then he locked something inside and forgot the password, certain nobody would ever get back in.

~Depp1135

misc.name: The Lost Vault of the Astral Bank
misc.desc:
A cosmic bank drifted off-chain and only partially synced to the Ethereum multiverse. Some withdrawals run in parallel universes… literally.

Will you be able to salvage the Astral Vault's funds before reality collapses?

NOTE: To log into your player account, you will need the following private key:

0x6f417a6329f7f757da3cc9e2badd1c3717d0dbf48400ee4687e3265ac6f72b26

~zeph

misc.name: The Mosaic
misc.desc:
I just dropped my favorite masterpiece on the floor and now it's in a hundred pieces. The curator is furious. He keeps muttering something about labels on the back of the canvas, but I'm too busy crying. Can you fix it before the exhibit opens?

~Depp1135

pwn.name: PanoramaTraceMission
pwn.desc:
Who ever said that PTM don’t know how to find their way?

~tuppulix

rev.name: Astro Logic
rev.desc:
The stars align... or do they? This quirky compatibility calculator seems to be hiding a cosmic secret. Enter your birth details, and if the stars are right, you might just find a hidden message.

~Ciovino

rev.name: In Secure Vault 1
rev.desc:
I developed a super secure vault for my companies.

~Schrody

rev.name: Login System
rev.desc:
At NeverBeenPwned.inc we've finally built the most advanced login system — try to break in, I dare ya.

~Depp1135

rev.name: Lost Controller
rev.desc:
We've lost the source to our controller, and we can't talk to our agent anymore. We did find a PCAP of its last communication run. Can you create a new controller for us?

~Ciovino

web.name: CandyCrash
web.desc:
Our arcade cabinet now forwards every move to a referee API. Score 10k points the honest way or figure out how the refs keep their notes.

~Dione

web.name: In Secure Vault 2
web.desc:
I developed a super secure vault for my companies.

~Schrody

web.name: PhotoLog
web.desc:
Ever wanted to share your photos with friends easily? PhotoLog is a service focused on sharing images quickly and effortlessly. Upload your favorite pictures and share them via unique links.

~imdadadani
